revised_title: Unusual Pulmonary Lobe Deficiency and its Effects on Respiration
tldr: A young woman with a missing pulmonary lobe experienced shortness of breath and a troublesome cough due to the imbalance of blood circulation in her respiratory system. The remaining lobe struggled to perform the functions of both lobes, leading to health issues. This rare case study provides insight into the importance of both lobes in maintaining proper respiration and overall health.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Human anatomy and Pulmonology
